glossentry.glossdef: A diagnostic instrument used in automotive maintenance to measure the specific gravity of liquids, primarily used to test the state of charge in lead-acid batteries by measuring the concentration of sulfuric acid in the electrolyte solution. It consists of a glass tube with a weighted float and calibrated scale that indicates the density of the liquid being tested.

glossBody.glossUsage: The term is commonly used in automotive maintenance manuals, battery service documentation, and technical guides. It is essential vocabulary for automotive technicians and DIY mechanics performing battery maintenance.
